seo.pageTitle: Power your dapp and reach new users with MetaMask Developer Platform
seo.pageDescription: Explore tutorials, start building with APIs and SDK and join us at an upcoming event.

node.headline: Scale your dapp to connect millions of users with MetaMask Developers

childMarkdownRemark.html: Discover the latest developer tutorials, tools, sample code, events, and join our open source community.

node.customClass: noPaddingTop removeSectionPaddingBottomOnDesktop sideImageOverflow removeShadowAndRadius sideImageMinWidth50 hero-developer

modules.title: Explore sample dapps
Form XChange

childMarkdownRemark.html: Form XChange is an open source tool to create and use feedback forms on Linea. This application allows user to vote anonymously on various proposals.

modules.title: Polis

childMarkdownRemark.html: Polis is a platform dedicated to showcasing web3 tools, templates, and boilerplates. Frequently, these resources remain isolated or challenging to find within the web3 landscape.

modules.title: EventSea

childMarkdownRemark.html: Eventsea is an open source events website that makes it simple to create your own event registration and distribute tickets to your event. Every action is stored on chain and each ticket is unique, transferable, and verifiable.

childMarkdownRemark.html: Build your dapp using the same infrastructure and APIs powering web3's most popular open-source wallet.

modules.title: Developer > Start Building
Connect to MetaMask SDK/API

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Enable your users to connect and interact with their MetaMask wallets

Read the Docs
SDK Developer Guide
API Playground

modules.title: Extend MetaMask with Snaps

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Customize MetaMask with your own features and extend your reach millions of users.

Docs
Tutorials
Discover Snaps

modules.title: Run your dapp on Infura

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Leverage the powerful node infrastructure that supports MetaMask

Docs
Tutorials
Get Test ETH

modules.title: Test and deploy with Linea

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Deploy and verify your first smart contract on Linea's EVM-equivalent L2

Quickstart
Wallet Setup
Explore Ecosystem
Tutorials, workshops, and walkthroughs building web3 dapps, for developers, by developers.

modules.title: Developer > Tutorial list
Build a Dapp with Vite, React, and MetaMask SDK

image.title: ETH Atlantis- Building a Full Stack Dapp with Vite, React, and Typescript

childMarkdownRemark.html: This workshop will walk through how to build a Dapp with ViteJS and React and connect to the MetaMask wallet via the SDK. The sample app creates on-chain SVG NFT tickets for an imaginary event called ETH Atlantis.

modules.title: What are Snaps? A Developer Into

childMarkdownRemark.html: Snaps allows you extend the functionality of MetaMask. This video will cover what APIs are available to you, and how they can be used.

modules.title: How to create a MetaMask Snap

image.title: How to create a MetaMask Snap

childMarkdownRemark.html: Get started with Snaps. In this video, you’ll learn how install MetaMask Flask, use our template, start development servers, and connect MetaMask to your own Snap.

modules.title: Getting Started on Linea

image.title: How to Add Messaging, Notification and Video to your dApp

childMarkdownRemark.html: Let's write some smart contracts on Linea! How you can use AI to write your first contract, test it, and deploy it in just a few minutes

modules.title: MetaMask Snaps Workshop

childMarkdownRemark.html: Workshop from the latest ETH hackathon, explaining MetaMask Snaps and walking through how to build one for hackers.

modules.title: Let’s Build a Full Stack React Dapp

image.title: Let’s Build a Full Stack React Dapp

childMarkdownRemark.html: Workshop from the ETH hackathon, walking through how to build full stack React Dapp using SDK, Infura, Truffle, and deploy to Linea

modules.title: Build on Linea: Layer 2 A Crash Course

image.title: Build on Linea- Layer 2 A Crash Course

childMarkdownRemark.html: When to use a Layer 2 and how to build a NextJS Dapp on Linea with the MetaMask SDK

modules.title: Add MetaMask to your Unity game

image.title: Add MetaMask to your Unity game (1)

childMarkdownRemark.html: A quick video demonstration of how to implement the MetaMask Unity SDK.

modules.title: Deploy a Smart Contract with Hardhat

image.title: Deploy a Smart Contract with Hardhat

childMarkdownRemark.html: In this tutorial, we'll walk through creating a basic Hardhat project and deploying their sample contract.

modules.title: Deploy a Smart Contract with Foundry

image.title: Deploy a Smart Contract with Foundry

childMarkdownRemark.html: In this tutorial, we'll walk through creating a basic Foundry project.

modules.title: Deploy a Smart Contract with Thirdweb

image.title: Deploy a Smart Contract with Thirdweb

childMarkdownRemark.html: Workshop showing how to use thirdweb's Solidity SDK, manage it via the dashboard, and build an app to interact with it

Need Help? Come talk to our team on Telegram.

Join the chat group

node.headline: Meet Flask the developer preview of MetaMask

childMarkdownRemark.html: Get early access to new features, build your own Snaps, and test your dapps with the latest build.
Get email invites to special developer-only events, early access to developer previews, and updates on new product releases.

extraData.title: MetaMask SDK
extraData.content:
## @metamask/sdk

### Added
- feat: update onboard package ([#475](https://github.com/MetaMask/metamask-sdk/pull/475))
- feat: expose sdk version ([#474](https://github.com/MetaMask/metamask-sdk/pull/474))
- feat: set minimum required coverage to 50/100 ([#473](https://github.com/MetaMask/metamask-sdk/pull/473))
- feat: installmodal deeplink compatibility ([#471](https://github.com/MetaMask/metamask-sdk/pull/471))
- feat: socket handling optimization and devnext ui ([#468](https://github.com/MetaMask/metamask-sdk/pull/468))
- feat: expose rpc history tracker ([#462](https://github.com/MetaMask/metamask-sdk/pull/462))
- refactor: rewrite ios browser version detection for improved readibility ([#465](https://github.com/MetaMask/metamask-sdk/pull/465))
- feat: qrcode deeplinks ([#463](https://github.com/MetaMask/metamask-sdk/pull/463))
- feat: sdk option openDeepLink with dynamic url  ([#464](https://github.com/MetaMask/metamask-sdk/pull/464))

## @metamask/sdk-communication-layer

### Added
- feat: set minimum required coverage to 50/100 ([#473](https://github.com/MetaMask/metamask-sdk/pull/473))
- feat: socket handling optimization and devnext ui ([#468](https://github.com/MetaMask/metamask-sdk/pull/468))
- feat: expose rpc history tracker ([#462](https://github.com/MetaMask/metamask-sdk/pull/462))
- feat: allow editing otherpublickey for faster connection recovery ([#466](https://github.com/MetaMask/metamask-sdk/pull/466))
- feat: disable favicon in dappmetadata ([#467](https://github.com/MetaMask/metamask-sdk/pull/467))

## @metamask/sdk-install-modal-web

### Added
- Force align package version to sdk

## @metamask/sdk-react

### Added
- feat: set minimum required coverage to 50/100 ([#473](https://github.com/MetaMask/metamask-sdk/pull/473))
- feat: socket handling optimization and devnext ui ([#468](https://github.com/MetaMask/metamask-sdk/pull/468))
- feat: expose rpc history tracker ([#462](https://github.com/MetaMask/metamask-sdk/pull/462))

## @metamask/sdk-react-ui

### Added
- align version with sdk

extraData.title: MetaMask Snaps
extraData.content:
## @metamask/create-snap 3.1.0

### Added
- Create an initial commit when creating a Snap from the template ([#1917](https://github.com/MetaMask/snaps/pull/1917))

### Fixed
- Handle unhandled errors ([#1916](https://github.com/MetaMask/snaps/pull/1916))

## @metamask/snaps-controllers 3.3.0

### Added
- Add manifest localization functionality ([#1889](https://github.com/MetaMask/snaps/pull/1889))
- Add support for unencrypted storage using `snap_manageState` ([#1902](https://github.com/MetaMask/snaps/pull/1902))
- Add `OnHomePage` export ([#1896](https://github.com/MetaMask/snaps/pull/1896))

## @metamask/snaps-execution-environments 3.2.0

### Added
- Add `OnHomePage` export ([#1896](https://github.com/MetaMask/snaps/pull/1896))

### Fixed
- Await stream message delivery ([#1928](https://github.com/MetaMask/snaps/pull/1928))

## @metamask/snaps-rpc-methods 3.3.0

### Added
- Add support for unencrypted storage using `snap_manageState` ([#1902](https://github.com/MetaMask/snaps/pull/1902))

## @metamask/snaps-simulator 2.3.0

### Added
- Add manifest localization functionality ([#1889](https://github.com/MetaMask/snaps/pull/1889))
- Add support for unencrypted storage using `snap_manageState` ([#1902](https://github.com/MetaMask/snaps/pull/1902))

## @metamask/snaps-types 3.1.0

### Added
- Add types for `OnHomePage` export ([#1918](https://github.com/MetaMask/snaps/pull/1918))

## @metamask/snaps-utils 3.3.0

### Added
- Add manifest localization functionality ([#1889](https://github.com/MetaMask/snaps/pull/1889))
- Add `OnHomePage` export ([#1896](https://github.com/MetaMask/snaps/pull/1896))

## @metamask/home-page-example-snap 1.0.0

### Added
- Initial release ([#1918](https://github.com/MetaMask/snaps/pull/1918))

## @metamask/localization-example-snap 1.0.0

### Added
- Initial release ([#1889](https://github.com/MetaMask/snaps/pull/1889))

## @metamask/manage-state-example-snap 2.1.0

### Changed
- Add support for unencrypted storage ([#1915](https://github.com/MetaMask/snaps/pull/1915))

## @metamask/insights-example-snap 2.0.2

### Changed
- Update example insight snap to support transaction insights v2 ([#1911](https://github.com/MetaMask/snaps/pull/1911))

extraData.title: Linea
extraData.content:
Alpha v0.2.3 (June 22, 2023)

### Summary

This release focuses on optimizing the prover's hashing strategy to increase its computational efficiency.

extraData.title: Infura SDK
extraData.content:
#### [v2.4.3](https://github.com/ConsenSys/infura-sdk/compare/v2.4.1...v2.4.3)

> 19 June 2023

- NFT-000: hot fix for polygon [`#214`](https://github.com/ConsenSys/infura-sdk/pull/214)
- chore(v2.4.2): release version 2.4.2 [`#213`](https://github.com/ConsenSys/infura-sdk/pull/213)
- NFT-000: fix polygon url [`#212`](https://github.com/ConsenSys/infura-sdk/pull/212)
- feat: release version 2.4.1 [`#210`](https://github.com/ConsenSys/infura-sdk/pull/210)
- NFT-000: add integ test [`b3fb1f9`](https://github.com/ConsenSys/infura-sdk/commit/b3fb1f993b048bec5d33e584ed531a4220220fce)
- NFT-000: skip test [`ad51f17`](https://github.com/ConsenSys/infura-sdk/commit/ad51f17f5f63ea759398173400d4ac017bdc6bc0)
- NFT-000: fix url [`7350ce7`](https://github.com/ConsenSys/infura-sdk/commit/7350ce73f18ea28ddaccf7d6b52e5ab764b208b2)

####
